https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yTa5JlUHw0DiPxGnbP1PCckilrH.jpg Torrential rains cause the swollen river, whose waters inundate a village. The current drags the cow Crebinsky and his brothers, who miraculously reappear alive in a place on the coast. Installed there at the foot of a lighthouse, which brings survive by sea. Isolated military conflicts, the brothers created their own world: a particular universe made of realism and fantasy. Crebinsky
